website_summaries.verdict: An affordable wide-mouth bottle that insulates well and is easy to clean.
pros: Insulated bottle keeps hot liquids hot and cold liquids cold
Wide mouth design makes it easy to clean and to add ice cubes
Still slim enough to fit in most cup holders
cons: Loop cap can leak a little and sometimes retains smells

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a tankard!
customer_reviews.text: It's a tank. In the best way. I work in the trees and haul it up with me; it's dropped so many times I can't keep track, and it just keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Zenobia

customer_reviews.title: and you can also boil water if you end up in a bad situation without a water filter
customer_reviews.text: I chose this water bottle for two reasons, it is stainless steel and it has a large opening. I prefer stainless steel since you don't have to worry about any plastics leeching into your water, and you can also boil water if you end up in a bad situation without a water filter. If you do have a water filter a lot of them will just screw on to this wide mouth version, the wider mouth also makes it much easier to clean. As you can see the cap even has metal in it so your water is never touching plastic.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Functional to the bone
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this thing for years and it’s still trucking. I tend to fill up my water bottle once a day whether it’s big or small, so this gets me drinking more water. I have beat this thing up, it’s all dented up and I’ve actually had to use a screw driver and hammer to reshape it, but it is still going strong. I’ve boiled water in it while camping and made tea and coffee. It doesn’t hold any smells or flavors. Keeps ice cold for most of the day even in summer. Very functional and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Very good water bottle
customer_reviews.text: My wife is an outdoors and high-intensity​ exercise person and drinks lots and lots of water. She loves the Klean Kanteen line for its size, lid and the fact that it is stainless steel and very easily cleaned in the dishwasher. We have a number of these over the years. My one complaint is that they are easily dented and the bottoms can get so distorted from use that they cannot stand upright. Also, the lid can be a little fussy to put on and off since it is threaded. But overall, a very good and highly durable piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this and it holds 64 oz for big guys or people who drink a lot of water which we all should he's so aphappy with it my dad wants one! Very durable just like the good ole days! See pic below.
customer_reviews.author: Blew skeyesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Great for being outdoors for long periods of time
customer_reviews.text: Amazon's price for the 64oz is fantastic. I bought this for my boyfriend who works mostly outdoors and has been buying loads of bottled water all day and spending a fortune. This thing is huge so he can just fill it at home and then keep it with him in a lunchbox during the day.
customer_reviews.author: June ❤️

customer_reviews.title: I use one regularly for tea (unsweet) can bleach out and clean easy. I use daily
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 40 oz widemouth ones been using for 2 years or so. Many dents been dropped quite a few times no leaks can boil water in them if needed. I use one regularly for tea (unsweet) can bleach out and clean easy. I use daily.
customer_reviews.author: blade

customer_reviews.title: -( I am not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I got my 40oz bottle on January 14th 2017 it is February 5th 2017 and the inside of my bottle is rusting :-( I am not happy at all. The only thing I use this bottle for is spring water. Granted I use it everyday but I would think it would hold up longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Small

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product - the lids leak and liquid spills
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product unless you want your gym bag and backpack to be drenched with liquid that leaks from the lids. The lids do not seal properly.All five of my lids leak. I contacted Kleen Kanteen customer service and their “solution” was to replace the five leaky lids with five more lids that would also leak because of the flaw in the design that does not allow secure threading. The combination of a faulty product that leaks and abysmal customer service results in a one star rating. Kleen Kanteen has lost a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Holds water
customer_reviews.text: Holds a ton of water, looks nice. I've dropped it a few times so it has a few dents but I don't think that impacts it at all. Haven't noticed any corrosion at the dents. Only thing I don't like about it is that the handle stick up so much, wish it folded down when not in use. I will probably end up buying the D-ring top for it or maybe replacing it with the Nalgene version as it has a flatter top. There's no insulation, but I find my water stays cold for a decent amount of time. But I didn't want insulated, so t's not an issue. Just pointing that out to people who may not realize.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dantzler

customer_reviews.title: Good product still kicking 5 years in.
customer_reviews.text: It has being nearly 5 years now, since I got this bottle. It's pretty dented now, after numerous falls and high tumbles off from tables and whatnot. Sometimes, it leaks but only in the recent year, so it was perfect before. Still though, it's still a good product considering it's being 5 years now. I'm actually thinking about getting a new one, the leaking gets annoying at times, esp when I have coffee in the dang thing. 12 oz is the perfect amount for me, and plus I don't really like carrying a really large bottle around with me.
customer_reviews.author: Raiken

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cost to Value Ratio
customer_reviews.text: I received my first order and the seal inside one of the caps was mangled. I called Amazon, who swiftly replaced the item for me. We used these canisters on a cyclo-camping trip. I was amazed at how well these kept cold products cold and hot products hot. I had put ice in one at about 6 a.m. in the morning. At 4 p.m. in the afternoon, there was still tiny remnants of ice in the canister. Coffee stayed hot hot for about three hours and was warm after 7 hours. Made of sturdy metal and well constructed. Sturdy construction on the caps, also. These will last a long time, which makes their value to cost ratio exceptional
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Paint coming off after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Quite disapponted. Got the red because of the pretty color. But after just 2 weeks the paint is coming off. Hand washed only and no drops. For $25 I expected way more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but ive noticed that this bottle absorbs heat too much and does not keep my liquids cool. Example
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GET THE STAINLESS STEEL BOTTLE. This is the 3rd kleen kanteen bottle I've purchased. The frst two are well built and keep the liquids insulated quite well. The third one i purchased was the stainless steel color. I dont know if the bottle is defected, or if the absence of pain on the exterior effects the insulation capabilities, but ive noticed that this bottle absorbs heat too much and does not keep my liquids cool. Example. If i leave both my blue and stainless steel bottle in the car on a sunny day, only the stainless steel bottle will be physically hotter on the outside and the liquid will not keep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bottle, not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 different Kleen Kanteens that I have bought on Amazon. I have been using them for over 2 years. I like them a lot, but I have an issue with durability. I use my bottles everywhere and with the 64oz you have to be super carfull on good bump or drop from waist high and you have a permanent dent. The only other iaau I have had is a couple lids did not screw on correctly but that was corrected with a new cap I planned on getting anyway. It is single wall 18/8 steel and is safe to boil in.
customer_reviews.author: USMCSurvivalist85

customer_reviews.title: I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color, the matte finish, and the loop cap that I can just grab and take with me to both office meetings and the outdoors or use a carabiner to clip to whatever, but this is one purchase I very much regret. The bottle leaks. For all its good looks, it cannot even hold liquids adequately. After about a month of use, I noticed that my latte would end up in my purse, backpack, or all over my hands. I'd try to screw the cap on tighter, but then it got difficult to open the bottle. If I could get my money back I would.
customer_reviews.author: Papaya Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen makes some amazing water bottles, I have two of these and they work great! The vacuum insulation is awesome, it keeps my drink cold all day, ice will stick around for over a day in one of these even during a hot day. I love using it for traveling, it doesn't leak and I can always keep some cold water when walking around a city. The loop on the top is great for a big carabiner so I can just clip it to my backpack or belt.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: New model keeps leaking!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 40oz Klean Kanteen with a wide mouth, I liked the one I had so much that I wanted my husband to have the same. Unfortunately the lid seems to have an issue, it keeps leaking all over the place even though it is screwed on tight. My husband had it in his workbag and it caused his laptop to have a short circuit because of a water leak :( so frustrating, can't recommend this bottle anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy It Again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Have been using it almost every day for about a month, it’s comfortable and easy to hold. Water stays cold for awhile, with some ice it’s about 4-6hrs. Easy to clean, just warm water and soap. I take the lid off when I won’t be using the bottle for a long period of time which helps with limiting bad smells. Water always tastes fresh, the 20oz is a perfect size for fitting in a small-mid size cup holder and is enough to last a few hours before you refill it again. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur P

customer_reviews.title: 20 oz insulated in neptune blue - not well insulated
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since January 2019 and use it regularly. It's okay but not great. I suspect I received one with some kind of manufacturing error because its insulation is far from ideal. Ice will melt in this thing within a few hours when it's sitting in a 72F degree room. By contrast, I have a 16 oz insulated, same brand, that will keep ice frozen all day in a hot car. I still use this 20 oz because it does not sweat with a cold drink. Again, it's fine as a container. However, if you're specifically looking for something that insulates really well, look elsewhere. Did not get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Please bring back the old design !!!
customer_reviews.text: So I've used these before & been beyond satisfied in the past with how well they function - until now I'm sad to say. The older version/model never leaked. This newer model only leaks - nonstop - so frustrating. I used to be able to throw them in a bag worry-free about them leaking at all. Those days are gone with this new model. Super Lame
customer_reviews.author: Felnic

customer_reviews.title: BEST water bottle, but dents on rims
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over a year, every day. I drink about a gallon and a half of burkey water each day and this bottle is perfect for me to not have to refill every 15 minutes. I have boiled water in camp fires with this bottle and it worked magnificently. I also love that I can throw it in the dish washer. -- Cons: My only complaint is that it dents easily when dropped full of water. There are several dime size and smaller dents on the top and bottom rims. All the falls were from table height of about 3 - 4 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Struthers

customer_reviews.title: this bottle is very useful and helps me keep myself hydrated all day long
customer_reviews.text: this bottle is very useful and helps me keep myself hydrated all day long. does not seem to get warm too quickly. however, the body seems to get destroyed too fast. the labels are already unreadable and it's too easy to scratch it. I also wish it was a little easier to carry, as the cover's hole (to carry with your hand/fingers) is a bit too small/tight.
customer_reviews.author: ExB

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Perfect for Lunch Boxes
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE 04/2017** We no longer use these. They start to get black and moldy under the lid no matter how hard you clean them. Sucks, because they were perfect otherwise. ** Original Review 10/2015**I went through multiple other bottles for my kids lunch box; some were too small, some too big, some leaked. Eventually I found these and though they are a bit expensive they are excellent quality. *They keep liquids cool for a long time - sometimes more than 24 hours. *They wash fast and easy; I hand wash them. *They are the perfect size for my middle schooler's lunch boxes We use them every school day for the last month and a half and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Wyldfairy

customer_reviews.title: made by the lowest bidder in China
customer_reviews.text: This particular water bottle had metallic taste that didn't go away after multiple warm soapy water wash. I suspect it was manufactured differently (or cheaply) than the earlier versions by Klean Kanteen. I have four Klean Kanteen water bottles at home and none had this problem. I must say that the factory in China cheated on the manufacturing process. Klean Kanteen charges an arm and a leg for their products. They should make it right the first time. If they are really serious about the environment, they should aim for no "manufacturing miss" and stop giving their business to the lowest bidder in China.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Stands the test of time
customer_reviews.text: I had to have bought this about 5 years ago, and it is still in great condition and my favourite coffee mug. I have a separate one for when I don't want my beverage staying so hot for so long, or I add something cold to this one. But the lids and bottle are both super easy to clean and have held up really well. The paint chips off the coloured varieties though.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Disposition

customer_reviews.title: Nice size insulated water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old worn out water bottle. Performs as expected. I already dropped it on the cement and it just skuffed the top, no dents(yet) and no leaks. Also the top is a wide mouth so it’s easy to clean, that’s an important feature in a water bottle. Keeps cold cold and hot hot. Everything is stainless inside, even the inside of the top. If you want an insulated bottle then this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A win-win-good size, leakproof, easy to clean widemouth aning and water remained chilled.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it after 'polling' friends/family as I wanted something to take with me to yoga class and in my car on way to work to sip during my 22 min. 1-way commute to work as I'm not hydrating sufficiently during the day. Only used 2 days so far and only with chilled water (that stayed cool all day on a 90 degree day) and am very pleased so far. It's also gorgeous in its simplicity. I purchased a cafe top also and have not tried it yet but imagine it will be real handy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie S

customer_reviews.title: My Little Cannister
customer_reviews.text: Finding a single wall canister is almost impossible anymore. Everyone wants a double wall vacuum sealed unit. Well, you can't use those on an open flame.....oh you could but you would not like the results. Klean Kanteen's single wall containers are perfect for camping, bushcrafting or just everyday use! And options......did I mention anything about options? Love the plain stainless steel as it is perfect for my camping needs. But if you must......they even make 'em with colors! So now those who desire to be different can! Sturdy......reliable, size options, Klean has all your needs!
customer_reviews.author: R. M. SilkeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good size and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12 oz size which is great for a hot cup of coffee later in the day and is short enough to put under many coffee dispensing machines. The wide mouth container is easy to clean and the lid gives a good reliable seal (unlike sip lids) and has a loop for easy carrying when your hands are full.
customer_reviews.author: rgonzale

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Klean Kanteen, I lost the other one which I bought years ago and I must say the quality reminds superb. If you put a cold drink on it, it'll stay cold for about 2 hours, put a few ice cubes in it for twice as much time and if you freeze half of it it'll be cold for 24-30 hours. For example: get some Gatorade, pour half of it into a ziplock bag and put it in the freezer "standing up / hanging", this way you'll get a frozen stick of liquid and it'll be easy to put it into the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Andrés

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality without any toxic materials
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality without any toxic materials. Large size. Amazing how using something every day can accumulate good or bad stuff in our bodies over time. The double wall holds cool cool and hot hot for half a day. Only issue for me is the thin lip - required to seal against the removable cap seal, and not pleasant for sipping. The cap seal comes in and out for cleaning; innovative design with nontoxic plastic. The stainless steel is my favorite material as benign, strong, and easy to clean. The alternative aluminum suffers from aluminum oxide on all surfaces exposed to air oxygen, is found in brains of Alzheimer sufferers and I believe should be avoided.
customer_reviews.author: RealiT

customer_reviews.title: Its a monster....
customer_reviews.text: Love this canteen. I bought the 64 oz bottle and it's perfect for me. I'm on the road all day and I drink a lot of water so I can meet my hydration goal with 2 fills. It's super sturdy and keeps my water fairly cold for most of the day. I will say if you have small hands you should down size because I have pretty big hands and I can just get a good grip on this bottle maybe a rubber grip would help on the 64 oz. But grip aside I love this bottle
customer_reviews.author: jaynape3187

customer_reviews.title: Still have mine after half a decade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bottles in 2014, and only now (in 2020) realized I never reviewed them despite having been drinking water out of them daily all this time. The bottles have several dents from being dropped when filled with water, yet despite the cosmetic damage, they still works great. I rotate between the bottles every now and then particularly when I clean them, and I look forward to continue using them.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I own this bottle in the plain stainless steel finish as well. I purchased this one--in the Deep Sea finish-- for my boyfriend who kept stealing mine. Needless to say, we both love this product. It does a wonderful job of maintaining the temperature of our drinks throughout the day, whether it is a hot or cold drink. The loop cap is my favorite cap because it has never allowed anything to leak through. I can throw my bottle with hot coffee in my bag without worrying that it will spill on my things.
customer_reviews.author: NAD

customer_reviews.title: It is a common problem with all stainless steel bottles
customer_reviews.text: We bought quite a few of them to replace the plastic bottles for the family. Overall it is a bottle that works but won't look good if you use it frequently. The paint drop, the bottle dent easily and it look rugged after only a few weeks of daily usage. In fact during shipping, 4 - 5 of them got dented. I broke a few glass bottles before deciding on stainless steel and I believe most stainless steel bottles have similar issues. Be sure to check out other similar brands like hydro flask etc and let your usage and cost justify the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracion

customer_reviews.title: Love this but the insulation isn't working anymore
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars because I purchased 2 insulated bottles in 2018 and they're not keeping cold liquids cold and when i use it for hot tea, the bottle feels hot to touch. I do use them both everyday and put them in the dishwasher once or twice when I got lazy. They really are amazing. I just wish I didn't have to buy new ones every few years. I have another 16 oz insulated bottle that lasted for more than 5 years so maybe this one is defective? I'm very sad but I will always purchase insulated bottles from them. Aside from the defective ones purchased in 2018, i recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I have a bottle just like this and this one was purchased as a gift. It keeps the beverage nice and hot for quite a while. I love that it's stainless steel and the loop cap makes it easy to grab. It fits in the cup holder in my car. 20-ounce bottles are hard to find so I was really glad that I was able to purchase this in the bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An excellent bottle, the last thermal you'll need!
customer_reviews.text: It's somewhat easy to clean with the wider mouth opening, however you may need to clean it once a week or every other. I recommend a bottle brush so that you can get to the bottom half, as simply wiping it down dry with your hand won't cut it! If you start to smell some metallic-ness in the bottle, that means it's getting filthy. The bottle cap may leak if there's water trapped beneath. But besides that there isn't much else I can say about it, it really does a good job at what it does, and I highly highly recommend it over other brands. It's also fun to put stickers on. I got the red one!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Reusable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Drop test it anytime. It will dent but has 2 layer insulated protection. Keeps liquids hot or cool. Twist off lid requires some effort compared with a drinkable lid but it works fine and the opening stays clean with the twist off lid. Can easily hang it off a pack with rope or paracord thru the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand!
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide mouth of these water bottles. I feel I can really get in there to scrub the bottle. I won't use anything else. I've had this brand for years and have never had any rust pits on the metal they way I've had with other things that are supposedly stainless steel. The loop cap is helpful securing it.
customer_reviews.author: X Ray

customer_reviews.title: and they're great. Extremely rugged and durable
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen is always the way to go for me. I'm a truck driver, so stopping to get something to drink isn't always convenient. And, it's certainly not cheap to stop to buy stuff all the time. I have 3 different Klean Kanteen bottles, and they're great. Extremely rugged and durable, as one of mine is over 10 years old. It has dents in it, but has never leaked or failed me. The finish stays great, and these are made of 18/8 Food Grade stainless, so they're sterile. Just wash them, inside and out, with warm water and mild dish soap. Don't use bleach to clean this grade of stainless steel. You can't go wrong with Klean Kanteen bottles.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: These are insulated, can go in the dishwasher, fit in a tall luchbag, fit in a med size purse, fit in a backpack side pocket, don't have any bits to break or lose, they don't break, and don't impart a metallic taste on the water. What more could you ask for? I send my child to school with two- one for school hours and one for sports - and they do the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Love these, best value I could find
customer_reviews.text: Love these, best value I could find. Ive carried many 32 oz nalgenes, and the diameter is the same as those, this is naturally taller. As former military with lots of time in the mountains, this is perfect to fit inside my titanium cup that then goes in my padded cover. Unlike a nalgene, I can put it near a fire to melt the ice, and has a wide mouth for easier filling and scooping water or snow. As retired guy, its just a nice canteen that is easy to clean, doesn't keep any stains or smells. Just protect it from dents, I've picked up a couple small ones and these haven't seen any hard use yet.
customer_reviews.author: GTI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice. Dropped it several times from different heights on accident and I see no bends. I love how width of the mouth; I am able to put Ice cubes and a lot of water keeping it cool for a while. Cap is sturdy and strong; I don't think it will break... Maybe. The water doesn't have the weird taste from other metal bottles or plastic ones. What's cool is I could use it for camping and boil water, compared to the hydra flask. Overall I love it and highly recommend it for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Zeejaay79

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved my kanteen!! Notice how I use love in the past tense... I used this kanteen 5x a week for over two years and I guess the wear and tear of me dropping it from time to time hot the best of it and it started leaking.. bit it kept cold items cold for hours and did a good job with warm items as well (I primarily used it to keep my water cold) highly recommend! The 40oz is pretty big so if you're not a folan of carrying around big things I suggest a smaller one...
customer_reviews.author: Monaturally

customer_reviews.title: Great As Expected
customer_reviews.text: As I usually do, I read a great many of the reviews on this product before ordering, especially the lower star reviews to look for red flags. My 40 oz KK bottle arrived in perfect condition. I gave it a washing in dish soap and a good rinse. It does NOT smell, and it does NOT leak. It's sturdy and will no doubt last for years. I'm certainly happy that I ordered one. I'd say if you're considering this product, go for it. If, for some odd reason, you get one that leaks, simply file a return claim with Amazon. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan C. Valley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beverage Container, But May Be Difficult to Hold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a Rubbermaid beverage container for keeping cold water in the refrigerator. Although this is way more expensive than a Rubbermaid beverage container, it should last much longer. I also don't have to be concerned about chemical leaching from plastic material. My only complaints about this product is that it is large in circumference and very cold when refrigerated. Those with small hands my have issues handling this container with only one hand. I'm not sure how it could be made easier to hold, as I wouldn't want a handle or some kind of covering; perhaps a slip-on silicone sleeve?
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Wilderness certified!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first Klean Kanteen a number of years ago and there are a number of fantastic benefits to this great water bottle. 1) Sturdy stainless construction 2) Sleek design 3) Extremely sanitary 4) Wide Mouth 5) Easy to keep clean 6) Can be used to boil water 7) Sleek design Con:1) additional weight or some lighter plastic bottles. My original Klean Kanteen was still going strong before I misplaced it :o(. But I was glad to find a replacement here and at a better price than my first one. This is easily one of the best, and most reliable water bottles that I have ever purchased. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leftside HeavyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to carry around and pretty light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Klean Kanteen fan. I have had ice water last for over a day with the ice still in it. I was highly amused and excited about this. I take it camping with me and have ice cold water all night long. It's easy to carry around and pretty light weight. I have dropped my water bottle many times and the only thing that happened was some of the paint came off. There have been no dents, which I am very thankful for. I love this bottle so much that I have bought it as gifts for friends. I highly recommend this bottle for those who love to have ice cold water last longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sedakeem

customer_reviews.title: they dent very easily. They have multiple purposes though as you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would have a wide mouth opening such as a canning jar because I wanted to be able to fit my hand in to clean. Also, they dent very easily. They have multiple purposes though as you can boil water in them since they are not double walled/insulated. But don't burn yourself! The lid is plastic PS. They may leak a little if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephansuch

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep hot water hot
customer_reviews.text: The product is advertised as keeping liquids hot for 10 hours. However, I tested that and the hot water turned lukewarm at best 10 hours later. In the span of those 10 hours, I only opened it once at the end of the 10 hours. Returned the item. That being said, Klean Kanteens non-insulated wide mouth stainless steel bottles are amazing however. I have two of those.
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Good Product, no noticeable "smell" as talked about by others. Also has remained leakfree without having to tighten excessively. This thing is great, I love water, and drink alot, so this is perfect for me. especially day hikes, camping, festivals, outdoor events etc.. Ive dropped more times than can be counted, full, empty, half full, and never has it gotten a dent. i'm happy with the purchase. -Some says its just too big, but id rather have too much vs too little when it comes to water, especially while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Klean Kanteen's make amazing water bottles! We have three of them in our house. This wide one is easy enough to get your hand into and clean with a sponge, but it is even easier with a bottle brush. It will sometimes slightly leak at the seam but not significant enough that anything gets ruined. Ice will stay ice in this container for 2-3 days. It is worth the investment for keeping water cold for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Klean Kanteen water bottles as our primary go-to water bottle for our family of 6 for the last 6 years. We have carried them with us in North America, North Africa, all over Europe. My wife uses them biking and running and we use them for most of our field trips with the kids. Just great, durable, easily cleaned bottles. They do dent and, over time, the bottoms can become distorted from being dropped. But otherwise, they are just great.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Seal is defective
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these bottles for 6+ years and it has been great at insulting even though I have dropped and dented it multiple times. But I bought the one here for my girlfriend and the lid has to be cranked down really hard to prevent spills. That is definitely not the case for my bottle. I noticed that you can remove (and clean) the one here whereas mine you cannot. That feature must have comprised the seal. That said, I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Little

customer_reviews.title: Great portable 'water boiler' type stainless bottle
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this because of a video I saw on the internet, regarding a 'one-pack-system' that you could also boil water in. Consider it a 'portable water kettle'. This is SINGLE-WALL (non vacuum-wall insulated) and can be heated over fire, just remember to leave the plastic screw-on-cap off it). Works great to boil water (to disinfect unknown quality water) or for preparing boiling water to re-hydrate dried foods (like Mountain House). Great pack adder, but remember, it is 64-oz, so it is a BIG pack adder. Best to find small stuff (that's clean) to put inside it to reduce pack space.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C

customer_reviews.title: so good. Just remember to have the cap off
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of the single wall Klean Kanteens. So far, so good. Just remember to have the cap off, if you are heating it over the campfire/stove, it will melt. It will fit in the "GSI Outdoors Glacier Stainless Bottle Cup/Pot", which will then fit in the "Condor H2O Pouch". The cool thing that I ordered the "Sawyer Products Mini Water Filtration System" and was able to put the complete system with the 2 water pouches, into the Klean Kanteen. It just keeps everything organized and saves space in the backpack. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ditch your plastic bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Ditch your plastic bottle! I picked up these bottles to replace my nalgene collection ( 4 bottles in total). I got sick of the plastic bottles staining and smelling even after multiple heavy washes. The stainless is much easier to clean and I don't have to worry about sports drinks and teas staining the inside. Not to mention any plastic wearing off into my drink. The only down side might be that you can't see the contents without opening it. However this is very minor and does not change the advantages over plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome water bottle. I got the 64 ounce one and it's the perfect size for my husband to take to work and have plenty of water to drink It is great in all ways except I just wish it didn't sweat. My husband can't keep it on his desk at work because of the condensation. It keeps everything super cold though. But now I have to get one that doesn't leave his desk wet.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Necessary component of travel water supply system
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic 40 oz water bottle. If you buy at Amazon the Condor H2O pouch and the GSI Stainless Steel Cup (, you can fit the GSI cup at the bottom of the Condor pouch and this 40 oz Klean Kanteen fits nicely inside the cup. Perfect way to carry a good amount of water with you, as well as a vessel in which to boil water without trying to boil the "40 oz ocean."
customer_reviews.author: Hansonb4

customer_reviews.title: but after receiving and using it for a while now I really enjoy it. Had a slight leak but I think ...
customer_reviews.text: People have said that these bottles have a metallic smell or taste and I was worried before purchasing it, but after receiving and using it for a while now I really enjoy it. Had a slight leak but I think it was my fault for not closing the cap properly. It's a really robust bottle but it's a little bigger than I expected it to be. Still very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Full stainless for those who care about their health. ...
customer_reviews.text: Full stainless for those who care about their health. I drink water with lime juice and it would change taste in any other container (plastic/not real SS metal). This does not. Only issue is that being a insulated bottle, it doesn't insulate well at all. Keeps your hot drink hot for an hour, then it's a warm drink after that for another hour, then expect it to be a room temp drink after that...
customer_reviews.author: BBoE

customer_reviews.title: Stop drinking out of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: First, you've got to get used to metal instead of plastic, after that it's all cream cheese. I'm sorry I didn't switch to stainless years ago. I got the 64oz because I only have to refill it once per day to achieve my gallon goal. Someone wrote about a thin lip to sip out of, the 64oz'z lip is just fine. I was a little disappointed that it's made in China, but am looking forward to years of use from this product. I strongly recommend buying a bottle brush like this one:
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: kleen kanteen
customer_reviews.text: I love these kanteens and have used my last one for 6 years. But the issue is the cap. They did the lids differently and it leaks. There are so many times when I screw it on tight, then carry it to the car and there is coffee all over the sides of the kanteen. It leaks and has ruined my outfits in the car! They need to fix the cap!
customer_reviews.author: the best man trump

customer_reviews.title: Cap leaks with cold water, not just hot
customer_reviews.text: As many others have said the cap leaks -- on only the 3rd or 4th use, filled with cold water, closed securely, and in a separate pocket that keeps the bottle pretty well upright, the thing managed to dump the entire contents into the rest of my shoulder bag. A $.39 plastic bottle manages not to leak, how does a $25 one not? When kept perfectly upright it sure does keep liquids piping hot but I am terrified I will leave the room and return to find the kanteen has thrown the contents all over the wall like a child having a tantrum.
customer_reviews.author: Actual Person

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE BOTTLES!
customer_reviews.text: Best insulated bottle EVER! I love that it's steel, not plastic. The lid options are great, especially paired with the new Café lid 2.0, which is now leap proof. It stays ice cold all day. I now have one on my desk and one on my night stand, and so does my wife. Anytime we go out and about, these are the bottles we grab. Just don't drop them on the corner of the base, you'll get a good dent and it won't sit flat anymore. I would love to see them develop a rubber base to slide over the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong buying this!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything from this company! Perfect for camping and boiling water in since it's not insulated, can carry pretty much any liquid, nothing can really compromise the integrity of this water bottle, it's well built. Really durable. I got this to replace my old one since the lid of my old one broke and I just wanted another one of these amazing bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING WATER BOTTLE!
customer_reviews.text: Kept my ice water cold and a few cubes frozen even in 115+ temps! The only thing is that the cap does sweat a bit when temps get that high and the color is chipping off in a few places after only a month of use. Otherwise, it's perfect for me needs! It kept my water colder than friends who had the trendier Hydroflask bottles!
customer_reviews.author: AlyWren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunchbox size
customer_reviews.text: Packing school lunches has come a long way I carried my red Peanuts Gang tin lunchbox around. I'm always on the look-out for the perfect lunchbox and thermos combination: easy to open, clean, fill, and carry. The 12-ounce Klean Kanteen is the only bottle that fits in all of our favorites. I subtracted one star because of the lid: my six-year-old has a hard time tightening it so that it doesn't leak, and you can't submerge it to clean it (i.e., no dishwasher). But we continue to use it because it's great in every other way. P.S. It fits perfectly in the outer pocket of the.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition. Using these for our morning smoothies as the glass mason jars I was using was way too fragile and didn’t keep the smoothies cold. These are just the trick. The wide mouth is great leaving plenty of room to pour my smoothies into and now I can throw them in my bag without a worry. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my household
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Was pleasantly surprised by how long it stayed hot & cold for hours. One solid piece of stainless steel for easy cleanup. I use a baby bottle brush. Light weight & durable. Doesn't leave a metallic smell or taste. Loop handle makes for easy carry. Love that you can purchase different lids if lost or if you desire a coffee/tea lid or water spout. I occasionally use it to keep my baby's milk in if we're traveling & it stays very cold until I'm ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha M

customer_reviews.title: a very very good bottle
customer_reviews.text: an excellent bottle in all ways. carry in orca and maxpedition pouches. when not filled with water I carry a great many smaller items inside. it boils water quickly and I have also cooked rice and other types instant food in this. the wide mouth makes for easy cleaning with a bottle brush. the only small gripe I have so far is not about the bottle but about Klean Kanteen who does not provide a full stainless cap as they do for the 20 oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: bilker

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle. Cafe Cap Was Sent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bottle and it keeps things hot or cold for a very long time. The bottle is advertised as having a loop cap, but the one I received has a cafe cap. Not a deal breaker, but not what I was expecting based on the photo and description.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Winter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ice frozen for 48+
customer_reviews.text: I tested out how long this bottle could keep ice and was super impressed! I filled it with ice and water and the ice stayed solid for a full 48 hours until I decided to dump it out. It could probably keep ice for even longer than that. Great product, I love that its good for the environment and good for your body! Using regular plastic bottles can lead to chemicals seeping into the water due to leaving the water in the bottle for prolonged periods of time, thus deteriorating the plastic. With the Klean Kanteen, you don't have to worry about deterioration, just nice clean water! There is also no alteration to the taste of the water either.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this- but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love how hot and cold this item keeps liquids. I use this all the time. The only problem (which is a big problem for me). Is that the bottle leaks. I have dropped this bottle from time to time and the metal bends pretty easily- especially the rim which is why I think it's leaking. I also have the cafe' cap. Both the original and cafe' cap leak. Its a bummer to have to keep it upright all the time or to find your back-pack is soaked when you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Almost the ideal thermos for traveling professional
customer_reviews.text: Likes: - Keeps my beverages hot (or cold) for an entire flight between coasts - Lid is easy to hold on to with just a finger, and clips to my briefcase easily with a Nite-Ize S-biner Dislikes: - Too fat to fit in my briefcase, my next thermos will be little thinner so can be stored inside briefcase or in a jacket inner pocket - Dents easily - Contents collect on rim when opening and closing frequently to drink from thermos: I believe its dripping down from lid when I thread back on after first drink. On subsequent openings I have to be very careful to not let it drip on my shirt! Coffee stains are a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Earl E. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Poorly insulated
customer_reviews.text: So, yes this is a large bottle but as a breastfeeding mom I go thru 4 of these a day. I do wish it came with a sport bottle cap but they do not make one for the wide mouth. As an insulated bottle it is mediocre at best, the temperature of water changes in my 72 degree home so do not expect it to keep water cold while outdoors. It also sweats, so insulation must not be great. If you need cold water and sweat proof, look at PlanetBox but the bottle volume will be smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Haas

customer_reviews.title: A great bottle for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Reasons I love this canteen: 1) Great construction and solid design. 2) Surprisingly lightweight, yet sturdy. 3) Nice volume for holding plenty of water. Keeps me hydrated all day. 4) Looks super cool! 5) Super affordable. I have so far purchased two of these- one for me and one for my wife. Will buy from again!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kragel

customer_reviews.title: I have the stainless steel finish and after 18 months of use it still looks like new. Best of all it keeps your drink ...
customer_reviews.text: This bottle works! I have the stainless steel finish and after 18 months of use it still looks like new. Best of all it keeps your drink really cold. This morning I filled mine with cold bottled water plus three ice cubes. It sat in the hot car most of the day and by late afternoon the water was still cold and the ice wasn't entirely melted. The outside temp was 88 degrees and the ar was probably tenty degrees
customer_reviews.author: K.c. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler
customer_reviews.text: Well made reusable growler / bottle. I recommend it. I use it to carry my iced tea to work and beer home from micro-brews and local growler friendly establishments. Pros: Very well made and reasonably tough steel. When sealed, only stainless touches your liquid. Seals very well and is easy to clean. The bottle looks great. Cons: Since the inside is not coated, like say a Sigg bottle, and it isn't super smooth, it is a little more difficult to get staining substances 100% out on the first try. I use my bottle for carrying Tea to work, but it never seems to look like new down in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love Klean Kanteen!
customer_reviews.text: I love Klean Kanteen! I originally bought this to match my smaller size of what I thought was the same color that we had picked up on vacation in Napa Valley, Unfortunately it is not exactly the same color but I love it so much that I don't mind. The only time I experience leaks is when I fail to tighten the cap securely enough, so obviously not a manufacturer problem. It does truly keep drinks hot and cold for the length of time that they advertise, and even a little longer (depending on the temperature outside). Love the tall slim shape of this larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Balinao

customer_reviews.title: The lid is very sturdy and has a good seal
customer_reviews.text: Well made. A little big and heavy for backpacking, but it is solid and you could boil water in it if needed. I bought this to use with the H2Jo by GSI. The h2jo did not work out and leaked so I will not need this anymore. The lid is very sturdy and has a good seal. The opening makes it very easy to clean with a large bottle brush. It has rounded edges so no sharp corners for things to stick in. I could stand for this to be a little smaller, maybe a 32 ounce, instead of the 40. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: csandlinw

customer_reviews.title: Well made and just what I was hoping it would be!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this big boy for outdoor use. It is single walled so it can be put over a fire if needed. That was one of the biggest selling points for me but also the quality of the Clean Kanteen is way nice. I bought once that would be large enough to carry a decent amount of water. Really any size of these things would be great. I have yet to use it over a fire but this nice 'Kantee' will give me many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expections - even for a tough audience.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 91 year old mother-in-law to take to work. She really likes it - and she isn't the type to not tell me when something isn't right. (The last sentence sounds like she is a nag. She isn't. She is just honest..., and she is one of my best friends.) She loves the fact that if she goes to the office at mid-day with an iced-drink she still has ice at the end of the day. We bought her the Cafe Cap for it, figuring that she wouldn't want to screw off the top each time. She put the cafe cap in a drawer and drinks right from the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: The bottle leaks if tilted at all and that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle leaks if tilted at all and that is not what I believed it said in product info...also does not maintain the heat of water as advertised. This was most disappointing to me and not the quality of product I believed I was purchasing. I have not been able to give feedback to the company for some reason so I am writing this review in hopes the message of my dissatisfaction will get noticed and someone will contact me. Thanks very much!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Mollner

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this as I was doing some traveling and needed a water bottle. From day one the water leaked when it is on its side. I thought I didn't close this right but after a few web searches it seems that many people have this problem. This has damaged my leather designer bag with water stains. Very disappointed. Good money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept Coffee hot for several hours!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man these are the best out there completely the best! Later in the evening checked what was left of my coffee and it was still lukewarm! That's impressive! Got the brown to differentiate from the one I use for water and cole drinks. It should also be noted that the outside does not get hot, despite the heat of the contents/that includes the coldness when using ice cold drinks---It IS the perfect drinking vessel in my opinion: hygienic, easy to clean (no hidden spots to develop bacteria growth, and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Bashert

customer_reviews.title: Bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these specifically for my lactose intolerant son to bring milk to school in. It has worked so good all 4 of my kids now have these. In the end no matter what you put inside these are still cheaper than buying juice boxes etc. These are SO easy to clean, I just use a baby bottle scrub brush to reach inside. They don't hold odors in even if milk gets left in for an extra day. The insulator actually keeps milk from getting stinky, they never smell bad after school. I had one problem with my original one leaking which was solved by purchasing a new lid. KK has now resolved that issue on newer models.
customer_reviews.author: MistySky

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Love Klean Kanteen. I wish their production wasn't in China but it is a quality product and the company works hard to maintain ethical work conditions. The dark blue color is beautiful - high quality. I will give you a warning - you NEED a cafe cap or your coffee will never cool off! I kept bringing this thermos to soccer games in the winter and couldn't ever drink my coffee because it remained burning hot! Easy to clean. I want to try to bring soup to work - 20 oz should be plenty of soup!
customer_reviews.author: my2spence

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: I have three positive things to say about this bottle: 1. It's impressive how long things can stay hot or cold in this thing. I've left it in my car in the sun for over an hour and came back to find it still had ice cubes floating in my drink. Sweet. 2. I'm rough on my bottle- Sometimes I forget to wash it out and whatever water, tea, or juice I was drinking will sit in it for days - but after a quick wash it never retains any weird smells or flavors. Yay! 3. If I turn the bottle upside-down, it will fit in my bicycle's bottle cage. Woot!
customer_reviews.author: Aleafinwater

customer_reviews.title: Longer term water storage solution for car, hikes, emergencies.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly light and compact for storing a half gallon/64oz of water. Not easy but not impossible to drink out of - but this is more for longer term storage. ie a long road trip, or hike into the desert, where you would refill a smaller water bottle. The inside top of the cap is stainless so the fluid never touches plastic while inside. Can be used as a growler for beer. I am planning on buying a second for emergency long term water storage in the car or BOB without worrying that heat, etc is breaking down a plastic bottle into my drinking water
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good Water Bottle/Canteen
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle/canteen. Does a good job of insulating drinks and keeping them cool or hot. The water bottle will dent somewhat, but that is to be expected since it is metal. Also, the paint will scratch in areas, but so far I have been impressed with how well the finish has held up. The only real nitpick I have with the bottle is that water seems to collect around the metal threads where the cap screws on. This results in water building up and dripping when drinking from the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H.

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious odor develops.
customer_reviews.text: I bought and received this Klean Kanteen insulated bottle from Amazon. When I filled it with water, I noticed a slight chemical odor every time I opened it to take a drink. After several weeks of use with just water, I noticed a more pungent and obnoxious odor develop within this Klean Kanteen bottle which has compelled me to avoid using it altogether. I do not recommend purchasing this insulated water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Justice

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE I MADE
customer_reviews.text: Best stainless steel water bottle I’ve ever purchased!! I’ve stored drinks with ice cubes in it and the cubes lasts for days! I also put soup in it to bring to work and the soup is still hot when I pour it out during my lunch break. The loop cap is useful as well because I can just clip it onto my bag. Also I am a big fan of the Klean Kanteen movement to minimize our carbon footprint. They are a family based company right here in the US who work on making the world more sustainable! It makes me feel good about purchasing and using their items!
customer_reviews.author: Al Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Faulty gasket-->burned hands.
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of scalding! The bottle does its job of keeping liquids hot for many hours. However, the cap seems to be leaky without a hole. It might be a bad gasket that doesn't completely seal off steam. Once the steam condenses, it forms a ring of hot water, lurking in the seam, waiting for the next unsuspecting hand to untwist the cap. There doesn't seem to be any issues when I use it for cold liquids. I hope that Amazon will let me return it after a 30 days because it's a hazard. I do like the stainless steel and wide mouth.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle for carrying in my Lovous military, molle, water bottle pouch with it stored inside my GSI Outdoors Glacier Stainless Bottle Cup/Pot. They all fit together and are ready to go where ever I decide to take them. The bottle is one piece stainless so it can be used to heat water if the need arises and with the pot I can use them together. Great bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bottle I've ever had the pleasure to use. Because I want to be a part of conservation, I have purchased tons of bottles by type and brand. Nothing compares to this bottle. I put ice in it at 9am on a Monday and the ice was still there the next day - that's with zero refrigeration; it was left at room temperature. Due to the double insulation method there is zero sweating or condensation. The wide mouth allows for all types of ice and water machines plus easy to clean. I primarily use this for a water bottle but it could easily be used as a hot thermos. Zero after taste. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: seymour5000

customer_reviews.title: The threads on the Klean Kanteen are "stamped" into the bottle where as the threads are added to the outside of the Nalgene bott
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quality stainless steel bottle look no further than a Nalgene stainless steel bottle. The threads on the Klean Kanteen are "stamped" into the bottle where as the threads are added to the outside of the Nalgene bottle thus creating a better seal. The stainless steel on the Nalgene bottle is thicker that the Klean Kanteen. For an all around better bottle go with a Nalgene Stainless steel bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good quality insulated bottle- keeps tea hot for several hours, and cold drinks cold a long time. I like that the inside of the cap is stainless also, so no plastic touching your drink, but I don't like the small silicone seal in the cap... it gets gross, and is hard to remove and clean which I have to do at least once a week! I would buy it again, but wish they could fix the cap so it was easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

product_meta.title: Klean Kanteen Wide Mouth Double Wall Insulated Water Bottle with Loop Cap
feature_bullets: Slim design fits in most cup holders
Does not retain or impart flavors
